message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. I believe this offers a fair distribution considering the potential for inflation.
I think this is a more balanced split, considering the initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.
Considering the previous offers and aiming for a more equitable distribution, I propose a 55/45 split. This maintains a reasonable gap while being mindful of the potential inflation effects.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think this split is still too skewed in your favor. I'd like to see a more even split.
